about_the_game:
Aloha! You're back in Hawaii to reopen the family restaurant, once the best on the Island, now starting from scratch! With an eye for delicious recipes and island spirit in your heart, find inspiration and allies from around Hawaii to level up your kitchen from a local dive to a masterpiece!

Lead your kitchen staff in a one of a kind Cooking RPG. Pause time to manage your Cooks stress-free and use their unique abilities to prepare food of the highest quality. Customize your staff, recipes, and workflow to master the strategies of kitchens across the Island.

In this demo, take a bite of the kitchen management RPG gameplay, level up your chefs, build some relationships, and master a handful of Maikai's kitchens!
